# f5distributedcloud_active_service_policies (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_active_service_policies` data source retrieves information about active service policies.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_active_service_policies" "example" {
  name      = "my-active-policies"
  namespace = "my-namespace"
}

output "enabled" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_active_service_policies.example.enabled
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the active service policies to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the active service policies is located.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the active service policies.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the active service policies is enabled.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the active service policies.
